body: To reproduce: ```sh run-clang-tidy \ -checks="-*,misc-const-correctness" \ -p _build \ -fix \ $(find . -name "*.h" -or -name "*.cpp" | grep -v "/_build/") ``` - - - This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/TokTok/qTox/74)

comment_data.body: Not relevant for this pr, but this is likely an identity function.

commit.message:
cleanup: Add `const` to local variables where possible.

To reproduce:
```
run-clang-tidy \
  -checks="-*,misc-const-correctness" \
  -p _build \
  -fix \
  $(find . -name "*.h" -or -name "*.cpp" | grep -v "/_build/")
```
